DOC.brief_summary: This pilot trial iPad-based intervention glioma patient University California , San Francisco ( UCSF ) establish feasibility preliminary efficacy data support funding application large clinical trial . Twenty patient stable low-grade glioma complete computerized battery standardize neurocognitive test quality life assessment baseline . Subjects complete intervention home 3 month . Neuro-cognitive testing repeat 3 9 month baseline . Subjects also complete post-intervention questionnaire usefulness , attractiveness , difficulty burden intervention . Clinical data collect time assessment . This include diagnostic treatment history , magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI data ) , tumor genomics immunohistochemistry .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility And Efficacy Of An iPad-Based Cognitive Rehabilitation Program In Brain Tumor Patients
